Name: Vampire Prince
Text: A mirror? But how... wait, no, I understand! You are saying that true dandyism comes not from one's outward appearance of mannerisms.

Name: Vampire Prince
Text: No, it comes from how one carries themselves! Their confidence, their soul! Yes, thank you, thank you! I shall carry this lesson for as long as I do not live! I must go now, the gala awaits!

Name: Tired Witch
Text: ([i]...Did they even look in the mirror?[/i])
